name: Muigi's Lansion
description:
Creation for the Demake Game Jam 2018. Unity Executable for Win Mac and Linux

this is a demake of Luigi's Mansion. Because of the time constraints it sort of turned into a survival game while you fight off ghosts. The mechanics are similar where you have to flash the ghosts to see their hearts and then suck them up to capture them. 

You can interact with the props and doors with the Vac as well as "E". As well as getting some signature lines when pressing "E" when Muigi is not near any props. 

Thanks for Playing

Controls:

Move - WASD

Flashlight - F

Vac - V

Interact - E

Created by

Crychair - Evan Malmud - Programmer, Voice Acting, and Project Lead

Matt Daday - Pixel Artist

Emmitt Spliff - Music/Sound Designer

Kenta - Patrick Baker - SFX and Voice Acting
